meanings.sent1: During midsummers, the sun shines brightly in the sky.

meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed beautifully in the warmth of midsummers.
meanings.sent5: Children love playing outside during the long days of midsummers.

meanings.sent1: Many people go on vacation during midsummers.

meanings.sent3: The town fair is always held in the excitement of midsummers.
